section.title: Viewing the Bottleneck Summary
section.para: To find out more about bottleneck capacity or utilization, view a bottleneck summary.

step.para: Click Summary if it is not already selected.
Expand the tree on the left side, until you can see the desired providers, clusters, or datastores.
Use the Options section to change the characteristics of the data.

listitem.para: Use Event Groups to select if you want to see bottlenecks based on capacity, utilization or both.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: Data is processed, and a timeline appears. Click on an icon in the timeline to see specific information on the bottleneck.
